title: Justin & Hailey Bieber’s Wedding Pics Are Here Ft. A-Listers And Neck Tatts
text:
Thanks for signing up!

New portraits have emerged from the (second) wedding of Justin and Hailey Bieber, showcasing the couple in some admittedly luxurious black-and-white tones.

They roped their mates in for the photoshoot, too. If you’re the kind of person who likes to ogle celebrities, you are in the right goddamn place.

The Biebers, who celebrated their latest nuptials on Monday at the Montage Palmetto Bluff resort in South Carolina, took to Instagram overnight with the goods. Observe:

Then there was the all-star cast of friends and family, including Hailey’s mates Kendall Jenner, Joan Smalls, Justine Skye, Renell Medrano, and Riley Montana.

Then there were elements of the extended Jenner clan, including Kris Jenner, her partner Corey Gamble, Kylie Jenner, and Kylie’s bub Stormi.

(Swipe through for piccies of the wedding gift bags, which appear to have included Blu-Ray copies of The Notebook. As you do.)

Mr. Bieber’s mates came through, too, with Jaden Smith, videographer Alfredo Flores, and security head honcho Mikey Arana making appearances in the official shots.

Swish. We’ll keep you posted when the photos of their eventual third wedding become available.
description: Piccies from the couple's latest nuptials have popped up on social media.
